ajc-test.title: Not binding constructor when using more than one compilation
ajc-test.abccomment: Need to compile second file, loading the CLASS file produced by the first compile. Requires modifying behaviour of polyglot loader. Aske looking into this as of July 1/04. LJH Aske has made it so it can load a class file, but now abc cannot resolve InnerAspect when compiling the second file. j2j seems to be able to do it, but not abc. July 6/04. LJH
